name: DraGreed
description:
Dragreed is a cute 2D jumping adventure game on the PC platform. Players will play the role of a greedy dragon, exploring the mysterious castle to find gold. However, taking away the gold means increasing the weight and bodysize, which will influence the height of jumping and the flexibility of movement. At this time, the player has to decide to give up the golds obtained to jump onto the cliff or avoid the enemy...

Golds or survival? There must be a trade-off for the dragon. Not all findings mean earning. Sometimes you lose something.
